fulltext:
TRI MINH XI 
Curriculum Vitae 
Major in Information Technology 
Personal details 
Full Name 
: 
Tri Minh Xi 
Gender  :  Male 
Date of Birth : 
19th September 1992   
Nationality 
:  Vietnam 
Marital Status :  Single  
Background summary 
Software engineer with 4 years of experience in software development for Enterprise 
Solution. Having skill of programming, knowledge on software development process. Ability 
to work in high pressure environment. Good at English, Chinese (Cantonese) and beginner 
level of Japanese. 
Education 
2010 – 2014: 
Ho Chi Minh City University of Foreign Languages – Information Technology (HUFLIT) 
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
Bachelor of Information Technology 
2007 – 2010: 
Nguyen Khuyen High School 
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
Work experiences 
August 2014 – Present: 
Global CyberSoft (Vietnam) JSC 
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
• Position: Software Engineer August 2014 - Present
